venice.lib.networkIIO

Class SlotFlags

  • java.lang.Object
    • venice.lib.networkIIO.SlotFlags

  • public class SlotFlags
extends java.lang.Object
    Defines flags for the handling of slots for the network node.

    If a flag is null, the relevant object has to decide on its own what setting is to be used.

    The IIONamespaceBuilder uses SlotFlags to determine activation or deactivation of importing/exporting outslots/inslots.

    Author:
    Oliver Eickmeyer
